original_text: Greet Andronicus and Junia, my fellow Jews who have been in prison with me. They are outstanding among the apostles, and they were in Christ before I was.
korean_text: 내 친척이요 나와 함께 갇혔던 안드로니고와 유니아에게 문안하라 그들은 사도들에게 존중히 여겨지고 또한 나보다 먼저 그리스도 안에 있는 자라

sentences.original_text: who have been in prison with me
They are outstanding among the apostles
and they were in Christ before I was
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 내가 그리스도에 들어가기 전부터 있었다
